footer.heroSubtitle: The best place to buy and sell fashion products

about.heroDescription: You don't have to be rich to wear something unique
about.heroSubtitle: A psychological identity wrapped in fabric
about.aboutDescription: KENZAR represents more than fashion—it is a psychological statement. We create clothing that speaks to the soul of young adults who seek meaning in their style.
about.storyParagraph1: KENZAR was born from the belief that fashion should be more than just clothing—it should be a form of self-expression, a psychological statement that reflects who you are on the inside. We understand that young adults today are looking for more than just trends; they want meaning, authenticity, and pieces that resonate with their inner identity.
about.storyParagraph2: Our journey began with a simple observation: you don't need to spend a fortune to wear something unique. Every piece in our collection is designed with the modern young adult in mind—someone who values comfort, appreciates quality, and isn't afraid to make a statement through their style choices.
about.storyParagraph3: At KENZAR, we believe in the power of psychological fashion—clothing that not only looks good but makes you feel confident, comfortable, and authentically yourself. Welcome to a brand where comfort meets ostentation, where every thread has meaning.
about.value1Description: Fashion that speaks to your inner self and expresses your unique psychological landscape.
about.value2Description: Premium quality and unique designs without the premium price tag.
about.value3Description: Every piece is crafted with intention, comfort, and personal expression in mind.
about.visionParagraph1: We envision a world where fashion is democratized—where every young adult has access to clothing that reflects their personality, values, and aspirations without breaking the bank.
about.visionParagraph2: KENZAR is more than a clothing brand; we're a movement toward meaningful fashion that prioritizes psychological comfort alongside physical comfort.

collection.collectionDescription: Discover the essence of KENZAR's vision—where psychological comfort meets sophisticated design in minimalist streetwear.
collection.whatsappOrderMessage: Hi! I'm interested in ordering {item} from KENZAR collection. Can you help me with details and pricing?
collection.customOrdersDescription: Can't find exactly what you're looking for? We offer custom designs and personalization.

contact.contactDescription: We're here to answer your questions, assist with orders, or help bring your custom ideas to life. Connect with KENZAR today!
contact.whatsappMessage: Hi! I'd like to get in touch with KENZAR. How can we connect?
contact.faq1Question: How can I place an order?
contact.faq1Answer: You can place an order by contacting us via WhatsApp or Instagram. We'll help you choose the perfect items and arrange payment and delivery.
contact.faq2Answer: Yes! We offer worldwide shipping. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location.
contact.faq3Answer: We offer sizes from XS to XXL. If you need custom sizing, just let us know when you contact us.
contact.faq4Answer: Absolutely! We love creating custom pieces. Contact us with your ideas and we'll work together to bring your vision to life.
contact.ctaDescription: We're here to help you find the perfect KENZAR pieces for your wardrobe.

policy.introDescription: Everything you need to know about returns, delivery, and our commitment to quality.
policy.whatsappQuestionMessage: Hi! I have a question about KENZAR's return & delivery policy. Can you help me?
policy.returnPolicy1: Returns accepted within 14 days of delivery
policy.returnPolicy2: Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in original condition
policy.returnPolicy4: Contact us via WhatsApp to initiate a return
policy.returnPolicy5: Customer is responsible for return shipping costs unless item is defective
policy.delivery4: Free local delivery on orders over $100
policy.delivery5: Tracking information provided for all orders
policy.quality1: All items are quality-checked before shipping
policy.quality2: Defective items will be replaced or refunded
policy.quality3: We stand behind the craftsmanship of every piece
policy.quality4: If you receive a damaged item, contact us immediately
policy.processing3: Processing time excludes weekends and holidays
policy.processing4: You will receive a confirmation when your order ships
policy.processing5: Rush processing available for urgent orders
policy.customOrdersParagraph: Custom-made items require additional processing time and may have different return policies. We'll discuss all details with you before confirming your custom order.
policy.internationalShippingParagraph: International customers are responsible for any customs duties, taxes, or additional fees imposed by their country. These charges are not included in the product price or shipping cost.
policy.sizeExchangeParagraph: If you need a different size, we offer one free size exchange within 14 days of delivery. The original item must be in perfect condition for exchange.
policy.contactSupportParagraph: For any questions about returns, exchanges, or delivery, please contact us via WhatsApp or Instagram. We're here to help make your KENZAR experience exceptional.
policy.ctaDescription: Our team is here to help clarify any policy questions and ensure you have a great experience with KENZAR.
